title: TL;DR: the road to Luna Park

replies.body:
I know we dont have that big an esports scene compared to the rest of the world mainly due to our lower region population, but I assume you get paid for this and should have someone review your articles before publishing?  I'll gladly accept some RP to review for you in future if you would like.

Paragraph 1:

Chiefs eSports Club and Legacy eSports have met twice in the last year, and both matches ended in Legacy’s victory.

Should read "ended with the Chiefs victorious"

3rd from final paragraph:  

Avant Garde found their first big win of the split as they controlled Legacy from beginning to end to give the Winter champions a 0-2 week.

Should read " to end to give last years Winter champions a 0-2 week."  

Unless winter in Australia has moved or August 8th has already passed and legacy have unexpectedly won ? Upcoming Nostradamus Manisier ?

Hope I was helpful and not rude, look forward to reading your future articles, all the best.

With all due respect, your an idiot. The above page says that "Chiefs eSports Club and Legacy eSports have met twice in the last year, and both matches ended in Legacy’s victory." This is correct in it's statement. Last year (2014, not last split, which may be what your confusing) Legacy were the winners of both encounters.

Once again, i mean no offence.
                                                  Corey (Llama)

We'll I must disagree profusely, the article mentions YEAR twice in the 1st paragraph and both times it is referring to

*IN* the last year not *IN* the Previous Year.  As is in the most recent encounters in  the last 12 months.

The article is Obviously referring to last split which is in the last year,  not 2014.

"To settle the rivalry for the year" once again referring to within this last year.

If you wish to argue your case, I would request that you read up on the use of subjunctives. Riot has used them correctly in the form that they intended. For the first point, I understand what you are trying to say, but to infer what you have , the sentence would have to state "Over the last year". As for the second point, you have completely disregarded the rest of the OPL, the fact that legacy were the champions for last year that would make them the main rivals of the year. This in turn verifies the accuracy of the statement, and liquidates yours.
I don't mean to be rude either but I don't wish for this to become an argument, so if any RIOT employees or anyone who holds any powers of verification on the subject, please reply (I would welcome all your inputs).

Llama
